name: Dissonance - IMD2006 Final
description:
Welcome Wanderer.  The Basement Dwellers presents Dissonance.

An unknown phenomena has caused the Multiverse to collapse in on itself and had sparked an all-out war amongst the universes. While the embers of bloodshed have simmered down, it has left a wake of ruin across everyone’s lives.

Play through the story of a lone wanderer who lost everything from this disastrous calamity that befell their home. Hearing rumours of one called “The Architect”, capable of bending the Multiverse to their whim, the wanderer sets on a journey to seek a boon from this all-mighty being.

------------------ Explore Unique Worlds.

-Visit domains of varying universes ravaged by a Multiverse calamity.

-Search around to piece together the unfortunate narratives of past inhabitants.

-Scavenge for information that can give you an upper edge in coming encounters.

------------------ Engage in Duels Against Those Who Cross Your Path.

-Encounter lone souls like yourself

-Engage in synchronous turn based combat and strategize your string of actions to outplay your opponents.

-Show mercy to your opponents, or be the villain in their history. The choices you make now may haunt you later on…

------------------ Do What You Must.

 Seek out “The Architect” to restore your home universe, no matter what it takes…

------------------ Controls. Exploration:

WASD - Movement

E/F/Q - Environment Interactions 

Combat:

A/S/D - Attack/Reload/Block

Mouse Click - Decision Making
